name: Mad Springs
overview: Playing a bit like Bubble Bobble, for me, Mad Springs is a good take on that arcade classic and recommended. Published in Germany in both Magic Disk 64 1991/03, and in Game On GE 1992/2. Published in Italy as Trainer in both Hit Parade C64 n.60 (Ottobre 1991) and New Special PlayGames n.43 (giugno 1991).
